sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Grill or cook chicken until done. 2. Slice chicken into strips. 3. In a large bowl, combine chopped romaine lettuce, croutons, and grated parmesan cheese. 4. Toss with Caesar dressing. 5. Top with sliced chicken. 6. Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the salad. 7. Serve immediately.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Italian">4f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afce</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Chicken Breast (2), Romaine Lettuce (4 c</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Lunch">617596df9751021069a3b6fce053af66</meal_type> <name>Chicken Caesar Salad</name> <nutrition>Calories: 350, Protein: 30g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 20g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Grill or cook chicken. 2. Wash and chop lettuce.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:10:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3cac87979795021069a3b6fce053af9e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
